verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%>, a <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%>, a voice <S%G5613>as<s%> of a <S%G4536>trumpet<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>, one <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Come <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G5602>hither<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> the <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> come to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G3326>hereafter<s%>.

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>Straightway<s%> I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there was a <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> one <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> to look <S%G3706>upon<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G2393>jasper<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4555>sardius<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> there was a <S%G2463>rainbow<s%> round <S%G2943>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G3664>like<s%> an <S%G4664>emerald<s%> to look <S%G3706>upon<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> round <S%G2943>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> were <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G2362>thrones<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2362>thrones<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%>, <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%>; and2532, 2192 <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G4735>crowns<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> <S%G796>lightnings<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> there were <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2985>lamps<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, as it were a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G2930>crystal<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> round <S%G2945>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures<s%> full <S%G1073>of<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3693>behind<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3023>lion<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3448>calf<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of a <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G2226>creature<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G4072>flying<s%> <S%G105>eagle<s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G303>each<s%> <S%G2596>one<s%> of <S%G1438>them<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%>, are <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3788>eyes<s%> round <S%G2943>about<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2081>within<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G372>rest<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G40>Holy<s%>, <S%G40>holy<s%>, <S%G40>holy<s%>, is the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G3841>Almighty<s%>, who <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who is to <S%G2064>come<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures<s%> shall <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2169>thanks<s%> to <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G2521>sitteth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, to <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>,

the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> shall fall <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G2521>sitteth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4735>crowns<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

Worthy <S%G514><s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G2962>thou<s%>, our Lord and our <S%G2983>God<s%>, to receive the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> didst <S%G2936>create<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> they <S%G1526>were<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G2936>created<s%>.
